name: Super Mario GB
description:
Don't watch video if you wanna play without spoilers.

Game assets made by nintendo

Game made in gb studio

Game Version: v4.0.0

Controls:

X - to jump

Z - to interact with certain things

WASD - to move

Arrow Keys - to move

Game is still in the works only 1 world as of now and map will not be super mario bros map sorry a custom map but it will have good gameplay.
